# Function Examples

```{r}

exclaim_age <- function(age) {
  print(paste("I am", age, "years old!"))
}

exclaim_age(age = 10)

# function in python
# def exclaim_age(age):
#   print("I am", str(age), "years old!")
# 
# exclaim_age(age = 10)
```

# Naming Functions

Functions should be verbs ("get", "compute", "calculate", "determine" and arguments should be nouns
